posts.post_title: T206 sale, including SL and Fac. 649

posts.post_content: Thanks for those that have purchased.  Thanks for looking, Bill
Cards added and sold cards deleted.  Thanks for looking.  Bill

Hi Bill,
Your Wilhelm should have a mark (plate scratch) like this on the back
can you check and see if it does.
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=287480&d=1505177049[/IMG]

Thanks,
Patrick

The Wilhelm does have some marks in the same area, but it is not a pronounced.  Wilhelm is in the upper left.  The card has been sold.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=287494&d=1505184072[/IMG]

Thank you Bill. All of the Wilhelm's with a front like yours have
had that scratch on the back and I wanted to see if yours followed
that pattern.

Patrick
